00044 ComponentTreeItem::ComponentTreeItem(TreeItemType type, 
00045                                                                          void* elementPointer,
00046                                                                          QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00047                                                                          LibraryInterface* handler,
00048                                                                          ComponentTreeItem* parentItem):
00049 QObject(parentItem), 
00050 type_(type),
00051 text_(), 
00052 dataPointer_(elementPointer),
00053 component_(component),
00054 parent_(parentItem), 
00055 childItems_(), 
00056 isValid_(true),
00057 handler_(handler) {
00058 
00059     bool platformComp = component->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00060                         component->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM;
00061     bool endpointComp = component->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00062                         component->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS;
00063     bool hwComp = component->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_HW;
00064 
00065         // the type defines how the construction goes
00066         switch (type) {
00067 
00068                 // if this is the root item
00069         case ComponentTreeItem::COMPONENT: {
00070 
00071                 text_ = tr("Component");
00072 
00073                 // create the child items for the root item
00074 
00075                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00076                         ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL, component.data(), component, handler, this));
00077 
00078         if (!endpointComp)
00079         {
00080                     childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00081                             ComponentTreeItem::FILESETS, 0, component, handler, this));
00082         }
00083 
00084 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00085 //                      ComponentTreeItem::CHOICES, 0, component, this));
00086 
00087                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00088                         ComponentTreeItem::MODELPARAMETERS, 0, component, handler, this));
00089 
00090                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00091                         ComponentTreeItem::PARAMETERS, 0, component, handler, this));
00092 
00093 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00094 //                      ComponentTreeItem::MEMORYMAPS, 0, component, this));
00095 
00096 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00097 //                      ComponentTreeItem::ADDRESSSPACES, 0, component, this));
00098 
00099 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00100 //                      ComponentTreeItem::REMAPSTATES, 0, component, this));
00101 
00102         if (!endpointComp)
00103         {
00104                     childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00105                             ComponentTreeItem::VIEWS, 0, component, handler, this));
00106         }
00107 
00108         if (hwComp)
00109         {
00110                     childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00111                             ComponentTreeItem::PORTS, 0, component, handler, this));
00112         }
00113 
00114         if (hwComp || platformComp)
00115         {
00116                     childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00117                             ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACES, 0, component, handler, this));
00118         }
00119 
00120         if (hwComp)
00121         {
00122                     childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00123                             ComponentTreeItem::CHANNELS, 0, component, handler, this));
00124         }
00125 
00126 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00127 //                      ComponentTreeItem::CPUS, 0, component, this));
00128 
00129         if (hwComp)
00130         {
00131                     childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00132                             ComponentTreeItem::OTHERCLOCKDRIVERS, 0, component, handler, this));
00133 
00134             // HACK! We're using the vlnv as the data pointer to ensure uniqueness. Any better ideas?
00135             childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00136                 ComponentTreeItem::SOFTWARE, component->getVlnv(), component, handler, this));
00137         }
00138 
00139 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00140 //                      ComponentTreeItem::COMPONENTGENERATORS, 0, component, this));
00141                 break;
00142                                                                            }
00143         case ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL: {
00144                 text_ = tr("General");
00145                 break;
00146                                                                          }
00147         case ComponentTreeItem::FILESETS: {
00148                 text_ = tr("File sets");
00149 
00150                 // get filesets from the component
00151                 QList<QSharedPointer<FileSet> > list = component_->getFileSets();
00152                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00153                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00154                                 ComponentTreeItem::FILESET, list.at(i).data(),
00155                                 component, handler, this));
00156                 }
00157 
00158                 break;
00159                                                                           }
00160         case ComponentTreeItem::FILESET: {
00161 
00162                 // get pointer to the matching file set
00163                 FileSet* fileSet = static_cast<FileSet*>(dataPointer_);
00164                 
00165                 // set the text that is shown in the editor
00166                 text_ = fileSet->getName();
00167 
00168                 // Fileset always has three children: Default file builders, Files and Functions
00169                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00170                         ComponentTreeItem::DEFAULTFILEBUILDERS, &fileSet->getDefaultFileBuilders(), 
00171                         component, handler, this));
00172                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00173                         ComponentTreeItem::FILES, 0, component, handler, this));
00174 //              childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00175 //                      ComponentTreeItem::FUNCTIONS, 0, component, this));
00176 
00177                 // get files from the fileSet and append them to this item
00178                 QList<QSharedPointer<File> > fileList = fileSet->getFiles();
00179                 for (int i = 0; i < fileList.size(); ++i) {
00180 
00181                         // add child to "Files" child item
00182                         childItems_.value(1)->addChild(new ComponentTreeItem(
00183                                 ComponentTreeItem::FILE, fileList.at(i).data(), component, handler, childItems_.at(1)));
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 // get the functions defined for the file set
00187 //              QList<QSharedPointer<Function> > functionList = fileSet->getFunctions();
00188 //              for (int i = 0; i < functionList.size(); ++i) {
00189 //                      
00190 //                      childItems_.value(2)->addChild(new ComponentTreeItem(

00192 //              }
00193 
00194                 break;
00195                                                                          }
00196         case ComponentTreeItem::FILES: {
00197                 text_ = tr("Files");
00198                 break;
00199                                                                    }
00200         case ComponentTreeItem::FILE: {
00201                 File* file = static_cast<File*>(dataPointer_);
00202                 
00203                 // set the text shown in the editor
00204                 //QFileInfo fileInfo(file->getName());
00205                 text_ = file->getName();
00206

00209         case ComponentTreeItem::FUNCTIONS: {
00210                 text_ = tr("Functions");
00211                 break;
00212                                                                            }
00213         case ComponentTreeItem::FUNCTION: {
00214                 Function* functionP = static_cast<Function*>(dataPointer_);
00215                 
00216                 // if entrypoint has been defined
00217                 if (!functionP->getEntryPoint().isEmpty()) {
00218                         text_ = functionP->getEntryPoint();
00219                 }
00220                 // if no entrypoint is defined then use the only mandatory field in function
00221                 else {
00222                         text_ = functionP->getFileRef();
00223                 }
00224                                                                           }
00225         case ComponentTreeItem::DEFAULTFILEBUILDERS: {
00226                 text_ = tr("Default file builders");
00227                 break;
00228                                                                                                  }
00229         case ComponentTreeItem::CHOICES: {
00230                 text_ = tr("Choices");
00231 
00232                 // get choices from the component
00233                 QList<QSharedPointer<Choice> > list = component_->getChoices();
00234                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00235                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00236                                 ComponentTreeItem::CHOICE, list.at(i).data(), component, handler, this));
00237                 }
00238                 break;
00239                                                                          }
00240         case ComponentTreeItem::CHOICE: {
00241                 Choice* choice = static_cast<Choice*>(dataPointer_);
00242 
00243                 // set the text shown in editor
00244                 text_ = choice->getName();
00245                 break;
00246                                                                         }
00247 
00248         case ComponentTreeItem::MODELPARAMETERS: {
00249         if (endpointComp)
00250         {
00251             text_ = tr("Endpoints");
00252         }
00253         else
00254         {
00255                     text_ = tr("Model parameters");
00256         }
00257 
00258                 dataPointer_ = component_->getModel()->getModelParametersPointer();
00259                 break;
00260                                                                                          }
00261         case ComponentTreeItem::PARAMETERS: {
00262                 text_ = tr("Parameters");
00263 
00264                 dataPointer_ = &component_->getParameters();
00265                 break;
00266                                                                                 }
00267         case ComponentTreeItem::MEMORYMAPS: {
00268                 text_ = tr("Memory maps");
00269 
00270                 // get memoryMaps from the component and add them to the model
00271                 QList<QSharedPointer<MemoryMap> > list = component_->getMemoryMaps();
00272                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00273                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00274                                 ComponentTreeItem::MEMORYMAP, list.at(i).data(), component, handler, this));
00275                 }
00276                 break;
00277                                                                                 }
00278         case ComponentTreeItem::MEMORYMAP: {
00279                 MemoryMap* memMap = static_cast<MemoryMap*>(dataPointer_);
00280                 Q_ASSERT_X(memMap, "ComponentTreeItem constructor in case MEMORYMAP",
00281                         "static_cast failed to give valid MemoryMap-pointer");
00282 
00283                 // memory map always has 3 child-items: Address blocks, banks and subspace maps
00284                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00285                         ComponentTreeItem::ADDRESSBLOCKS, 0, component, handler, this));
00286                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00287                         ComponentTreeItem::BANKS, 0, component, handler, this));
00288                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00289                         ComponentTreeItem::SUBSPACEMAPS, 0, component, handler, this));
00290 
00291                 text_ = memMap->getName();
00292 
00293                 // get list of addressBlocks, banks and subspaceMaps
00294                 QList<QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> > list = memMap->getItems();
00295                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00296                         
00297                         // find out what class the MemoryMapItem actually is
00298                         // (this is done because MemoryMapItem is base-class for 
00299                         // AddressBlock, Bank and SubspaceMap
00300                         
00301                         // if object was addressBlock
00302                         if (typeid(*list.at(i).data()).name() == typeid(AddressBlock).name()) {
00303                                 
00304                                 // search the addressBlocks child item where the new addressBlock is added to
00305                                 for (int j = 0; j < childItems_.size(); ++j) {
00306 
00307                                         if (childItems_.at(j)->type() == ComponentTreeItem::ADDRESSBLOCKS) {
00308                                                 
00309                                                 // create the new ComponentTreeItem that matches the addressBlock
00310                                                 ComponentTreeItem* item = new ComponentTreeItem(
00311                                                         ComponentTreeItem::ADDRESSBLOCK, list.at(i).data(), 
00312                                                         component, handler, childItems_.at(j));
00313                                                 
00314                                                 // add the created item for the addressBlocks item
00315                                                 childItems_.at(j)->addChild(item);
00316                                                 break;
00317                                         }
00318 
00319                                 }
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         // if object was Bank
00323                         else if (typeid(*list.at(i).data()).name() == typeid(Bank).name()) {
00324                                 
00325                                 // search the banks child item where the new bank is added to
00326                                 for (int j = 0; j < childItems_.size(); ++j) {
00327 
00328                                         if (childItems_.at(j)->type() == ComponentTreeItem::BANKS) {
00329 
00330                                                 // create the new ComponentTreeItem that matches the addressBlock
00331                                                 ComponentTreeItem* item = new ComponentTreeItem(
00332                                                         ComponentTreeItem::BANK, list.at(i).data(), component, 
00333                                                         handler, childItems_.at(j));
00334 
00335                                                 // add the created item for the addressBlocks item
00336                                                 childItems_.at(j)->addChild(item);
00337                                                 break;
00338                                         }
00339 
00340                                 }
00341                         }
00342 
00343                         // if object was SubspaceMap
00344                         else if (typeid(*list.at(i).data()).name() == typeid(SubspaceMap).name()) {
00345                                 
00346                                 // search the addressBlocks child item where the new addressBlock is added to
00347                                 for (int j = 0; j < childItems_.size(); ++j) {
00348 
00349                                         if (childItems_.at(j)->type() == ComponentTreeItem::SUBSPACEMAPS) {
00350 
00351                                                 // create the new ComponentTreeItem that matches the addressBlock
00352                                                 ComponentTreeItem* item = new ComponentTreeItem(
00353                                                         ComponentTreeItem::SUBSPACEMAP, list.at(i).data(), component, handler, childItems_.at(j));
00354 
00355                                                 // add the created item for the addressBlocks item
00356                                                 childItems_.at(j)->addChild(item);
00357                                                 break;
00358                                         }
00359 
00360                                 }
00361                         }
00362 
00363                         // TODO remove this in final
00364                         else {
00365                                 qDebug() << "UnIdentified item in memorymap";
00366                         }
00367                 }
00368                 break;
00369                                                                            }

00564

00567 
00568                 // go through each key
00569                 for (int i = 0; i < busKeys.size(); ++i) {
00570                         
00571                         // append the item that matches the key
00572                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00573                                 ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACE, component_->getBusInterface(busKeys.at(i)),
00574                                 component, handler, this));

00632                 break;
00633                                                                                            }
00634         case ComponentTreeItem::COMPONENTGENERATORS: {
00635                 text_ = tr("Component generators");
00636                 break;
00637                                                                                                  }
00638 
00639     case ComponentTreeItem::SOFTWARE: {
00640         text_ = tr("Software mappings");
00641         //dataPointer_ = 0;
00642         break;
00643                                       }
00644 
00645         default: {
00646 
00647                 // TODO remove this
00648                 qDebug() << "Unsupported type in ComponentTreeItem constructor";
00649                 break;
00650                          }
00651         }
00652 
00653 }
00654 
00655 ComponentTreeItem::~ComponentTreeItem() {
00656 }
00657 
00658 ComponentTreeItem* ComponentTreeItem::child(int index) {
00659 
00660         // if index is invalid
00661         if (childItems_.size() <= index || index < 0) {
00662                 return 0;
00663         }
00664 
00665         return childItems_.value(index);
00666 }
00667 
00668 ComponentTreeItem* ComponentTreeItem::parent() {
00669         return parent_;
00670 }
00671 
00672 int ComponentTreeItem::row() {
00673 
00674         // if parent exists (this in not root item)
00675         if (parent_) {
00676                 return parent_->getIndexOf(this);
00677         }
00678 
00679         // if this was root item
00680         return -1;
00681 }

00684         return dataPointer_;
00685 }

00688         return text_;
00689 }
00690 
00691 bool ComponentTreeItem::hasChildren() {
00692         return !childItems_.isEmpty();
00693 }
00694 
00695 int ComponentTreeItem::getIndexOf(ComponentTreeItem *child) {
00696         return childItems_.indexOf(child);
00697 }
00698 
00699 int ComponentTreeItem::rowCount() const {
00700         return childItems_.size();
00701 }

00703 QFont ComponentTreeItem::getFont() const {
00704 
00705         QFont font(QApplication::font());
00706 
00707         switch (type_) {
00708 case ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL: 
00709 case ComponentTreeItem::FILESETS: 
00710 case ComponentTreeItem::CHOICES: 
00711 case ComponentTreeItem::MODELPARAMETERS:
00712 case ComponentTreeItem::PARAMETERS: 
00713 case ComponentTreeItem::MEMORYMAPS: 
00714 case ComponentTreeItem::ADDRESSSPACES: 
00715 case ComponentTreeItem::REMAPSTATES: 
00716 case ComponentTreeItem::VIEWS: 
00717 case ComponentTreeItem::PORTS: 
00718 case ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACES:
00719 case ComponentTreeItem::CHANNELS: 
00720 case ComponentTreeItem::CPUS: 
00721 case ComponentTreeItem::OTHERCLOCKDRIVERS: 
00722 case ComponentTreeItem::COMPONENTGENERATORS:
00723 case ComponentTreeItem::SOFTWARE: {
00724         font.setPointSize(font.pointSize() + 2);
00725         font.setBold(true);
00726         return font;
00727                                                                                          }
00728 default: {
00729         return font;
00730                  }
00731         }
00732 }

00734 void ComponentTreeItem::addChild( ComponentTreeItem* child ) {
00735         childItems_.append(child);

00762 void ComponentTreeItem::removeChild( ComponentTreeItem* childPointer ) {
00763         childItems_.removeAll(childPointer);
00764 }
00765 
00766 void ComponentTreeItem::getDataPointers( QList<void*>& pointers ) {
00767         // if the dataPointer is not null then append it to the list.
00768         if (dataPointer_) {
00769                 pointers.append(dataPointer_);
00770         }
00771 
00772         // ask all children to append their dataPointers
00773         foreach (ComponentTreeItem* item, childItems_) {
00774                 item->getDataPointers(pointers);
00775         }
00776 }
00777 
00778 bool ComponentTreeItem::createChild() {
00779 
00780         // the type of parent defines how a child is created
00781         switch (type_) {
00782                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILESETS: {
00783                         FileSet* fileSet = component_->createFileSet();
00784                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00785                                 ComponentTreeItem::FILESET, fileSet, component_, handler_, this));
00786                         return true;
00787                                                                                   }
00788                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILES: {
00789                         // get pointer to the file set where the file is added to
00790                         FileSet* fileSet = static_cast<FileSet*>(parent_->getDataPointer());
00791 
00792                         QString componentPath = handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv());
00793 
00794                         QStringList fileList = QFileDialog::getOpenFileNames(
00795                                 0, tr("Select files to add"), componentPath);
00796 
00797                         foreach (QString filePath, fileList) {
00798 
00799                                 QString relPath = General::getRelativePath(componentPath, filePath);
00800 
00801                                 File* file = fileSet->createFile(relPath);
00802                                 childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00803                                         ComponentTreeItem::FILE, file, component_, handler_, this));
00804                         }
00805 
00806                         return true;
00807                                                                            }
00808                 case ComponentTreeItem::CHANNELS: {
00809 
00810                         // create a new empty channel
00811                         Channel* chan = component_->createChannel();
00812                         
00813                         // create a child item that represents the channel
00814                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00815                                 ComponentTreeItem::CHANNEL, chan, component_, handler_, this));
00816 
00817                         return true;
00818                                                                                   }
00819                 case ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACES: {
00820 
00821                         // create a new empty bus interface
00822                         BusInterface* busif = component_->createBusInterface();
00823 
00824                         // create a child item that represents the bus interface
00825                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00826                                 ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACE, busif, component_, handler_, this));
00827 
00828                         return true;
00829                                                                                            }
00830                 case ComponentTreeItem::VIEWS: {
00831 
00832                         // create a new empty view
00833                         View* view = component_->createView();
00834 
00835                         // create a child item that represents the view
00836                         childItems_.append(new ComponentTreeItem(
00837                                 ComponentTreeItem::VIEW, view, component_, handler_, this));
00838 
00839                         return true;
00840                                                                            }
00841                 // if the item type is such that the child can't be created
00842                 default: {
00843                         return false;
00844                                  }
00845         }
00846 }
00847 
00848 bool ComponentTreeItem::canHaveChildren() const {
00849         switch (type_) {
00850                 case ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL:
00851                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILE:
00852                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILESET:
00853                 case ComponentTreeItem::MODELPARAMETERS:
00854                 case ComponentTreeItem::PORTS:
00855                 case ComponentTreeItem::PARAMETERS:
00856                 case ComponentTreeItem::OTHERCLOCKDRIVERS:
00857                 case ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACE:
00858                 case ComponentTreeItem::VIEW:
00859                 case ComponentTreeItem::DEFAULTFILEBUILDERS:
00860         case ComponentTreeItem::SOFTWARE: {
00861                         return false;
00862                                                                                                          }
00863                 default: {
00864                         return true;
00865                                  }
00866         }
00867 }
00868

00870 
00871 bool ComponentTreeItem::canBeRemoved() const {
00872         switch (type_) {
00873                 case ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL:
00874                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILESETS:
00875                 case ComponentTreeItem::CHOICES:
00876                 case ComponentTreeItem::MODELPARAMETERS:
00877                 case ComponentTreeItem::PARAMETERS:
00878                 case ComponentTreeItem::MEMORYMAPS:
00879                 case ComponentTreeItem::ADDRESSSPACES:
00880                 case ComponentTreeItem::REMAPSTATES:
00881                 case ComponentTreeItem::VIEWS:
00882                 case ComponentTreeItem::PORTS:
00883                 case ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACES:
00884                 case ComponentTreeItem::CHANNELS:
00885                 case ComponentTreeItem::CPUS:
00886                 case ComponentTreeItem::OTHERCLOCKDRIVERS:
00887                 case ComponentTreeItem::DEFAULTFILEBUILDERS:
00888                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILES:
00889                 case ComponentTreeItem::FUNCTIONS:
00890                 case ComponentTreeItem::COMPONENTGENERATORS:
00891         case ComponentTreeItem::SOFTWARE: {
00892                         return false;
00893                                                                                                          }
00894                 default: {
00895                         return true;
00896                                  }
00897         }
00898 }
00899 
00900 void ComponentTreeItem::moveChild(int sourceIndex, int targetIndex ) {
00901 
00902         // if there is no child in source index.
00903         if (sourceIndex < 0 || sourceIndex >= childItems_.size())
00904                 return;
00905         else if (targetIndex < 0 || targetIndex > childItems_.size())
00906                 return;
00907 
00908         ComponentTreeItem* itemToMove = childItems_.takeAt(sourceIndex);
00909 
00910         // if item is moved down then the target must be decremented because on item is
00911         // removed before adding to the list
00912         if (targetIndex > sourceIndex)
00913                 --targetIndex;
00914 
00915         childItems_.insert(targetIndex, itemToMove);
00916         
00917         switch (type_) {
00918                 // if one of these types then tell the parent item to sort the IP-Xact model
00919                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILES: {
00920                         QStringList fileNames;
00921                         foreach (ComponentTreeItem* child, childItems_) {
00922                                 fileNames.append(child->text());
00923                         }
00924                         parent_->sortModel(fileNames);
00925                         return;
00926                                                                            }
00927                 default:
00928                         return;
00929         }
00930 }
00931 
00932 void ComponentTreeItem::sortModel(const QStringList& idList) {
00933         
00934         // currently only file sets have ability to be sorted.
00935         if (type_ != ComponentTreeItem::FILESET)
00936                 return;
00937 
00938         FileSet* fileSet = static_cast<FileSet*>(dataPointer_);
00939         fileSet->sortFiles(idList);
00940 }
